tool_description: Get player count, MOTD, status and more for Java or Bedrock servers.
name: Minecraft Server Status
title: Minecraft Server Status

api_list.name: Server Status Full Live
api_list.description: Get the status of a server and a base64 encoded favicon. This request is not cached.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://minecraft-server-status1.p.rapidapi.com/servers/single/full/live"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "minecraft-server-status1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Server Status Lite Live

api_list.name: Server Status Lite Bulk
api_list.description: Request the server status of up to 100 servers at once. This request does not include the favicon.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://minecraft-server-status1.p.rapidapi.com/servers/multi/lite"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "minecraft-server-status1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Server Status Full
